title: Housing
description: Costs related to shelter, including rent or mortgage payments, property taxes, and maintenance.

title: Transportation
description: Expenses related to commuting, vehicle maintenance, public transportation, or travel.

title: Food and Groceries
description: Costs associated with purchasing food items and groceries for daily consumption.

title: Utilities
description: Regular expenses for essential services like electricity, water, gas, and internet.

title: Healthcare
description: Medical expenses, including insurance premiums, doctor visits, medications, and treatments.

title: Entertainment
description: Spending on leisure activities, hobbies, dining out, movies, and other forms of entertainment.

title: Education
description: Costs related to tuition, books, school supplies, and educational programs.

title: Debt Repayments
description: Payments towards outstanding loans, credit card balances, or other forms of debt.

title: Savings and Investments
description: Amounts set aside for savings accounts, retirement funds, or other investment opportunities.

title: Personal Care
description: Expenditures on personal grooming, clothing, and other self-care items.
